name: Keep On
description:
It's recommended that you play this game with a gamepad with an analog stick, but keyboard will work too.

Keep the blob on stage by grabbing him and throwing him back on.

Get as high of a timer as you can. The timer increments only when the blob is on stage and isn't being held by the player.

Press R to restart if the blob falls out of play.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:
R: Restart
Z: Jump
X: Grab Blob (only when off stage)
X: Throw blob (when held)
C: Boost
Arrow keys: Move.
